Reviews.Content: Solid Three-Star Inexpensive. Clean by Chinese standards. Rather long distance from anything, but since taxis are extremely inexpensive and available, it doesn't matter much. Adequate high speed internet. Adequate TV. Dining room OK. Caters mainly to Chinese. Consequently staff's Englishis sufficient only for standard request. Claims to have a fitness and pool, but we didn't check it out.
Reviews.Author: MacWilder
